name: Vice Dice
description:
Don't roll the dice if  you cant pay the price!

But if you can don't hesitate to.

Like a board game! Roll and proceed accordingly!

see what level you land on and try to beat it using your platforming skills (if any).

cross your fingers and reach the end. Cant be THAT hard right?!?!

well, good luck ;)

If you want you can download the game to play on your pc below 

P.S.  Don't mind leaving a comment or sum. it feel lonely  over here :')
